Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Embla?', 3: '... I want. Push everything. Past breaking point. I can. Wake "Father".'}
{3: 'Embla continues to trudge through the darkness with unprecedented agility.'}
{3: 'She skips lightly over the traps on the road as mines explode behind her.'}
{2: 'Embla?', 3: 'Just need. To get to. The Strip of Truth...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory298.png'}
{2: 'Alarm', 3: 'Sensing anomaly inside "The Strip of Truth". Acting according to Directive Number 3 of the "Naraka-Loop Protocol":'}
{2: 'Alarm', 3: 'Preparing detonations on load-bearing structures.'}
{2: 'Alarm', 3: 'In response to the anomaly, initiating protocol: Final Arbiter—Machiavelli.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Anomaly... Is it talking about Embla?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's the... Final Arbiter going to do to Embla?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Embla doesn\'t have any characteristics of a mechanoid that participates in the "war."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In other words... Embla won\'t be seen as the champion of this "war."', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'According to the mechanoids\' treatment of "non-combatants"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Embla will be destroyed.', 3: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Then we need to pick up the pace.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We need to find a way to reach Embla before she is destroyed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah. The anomaly in "the Strip of Truth" from the alarm must be her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We don\'t know what "the Strip of Truth" is... but we gotta hurry.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory304.png'}
{2: 'Archive Terminal', 3: 'School Archive — Speech'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "...I really don't want to see people's lives consumed in this senseless war."}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'You are the seeds and carriers of human memetics. Each death saddens me.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Let mechanoids take your place in deciding the outcome. Let these heartless shells bleed the last drop of blood for the future of humanity.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: "I just hope that when the champion is reborn and steps foot on the surface... you won't forget the defeated."}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: '...Victors and losers are both what the School wishes to keep and grow.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: 'Human civilization can only continue through memetics. Otherwise, we will only be bloodthirsty barbarians hiding in the mountains.'}
{2: 'Old Man', 3: '...Regardless which one of you is victorious, you must not forget this.'}
{3: '(Sparse and enthusiastic applauses come from the speaker...)'}
